name: (UN)RELIABLE ARTIFACT
description:
With the power of an ancient unstable artifact you have the power to stop the corruption around the city.

Use W A S D buttons to run.

Earn points by cleansing corruption from BUILDINGS and ROADS. But be careful! Cleansed buildings return back to normal while cleansed roads are destroyed.

If the game works laggy on Webgl build there is a download link for Windows down below!

Artist/Designer: Alara Çiloğlu / https://www.instagram.com/alaratheillustrator

Programmer/Designer: Ahmet Arif Acıduman /  https://www.instagram.com/vikaentertainment

Music: Kadircan Aksoy
